text: haey trong ban mean bantoul tha ao dei. chaur eng lebtuk robsa eng vinh choh . ao mekh. chaur eng chhb phlieng tow . pelnoh tuk kaban srak choh . haey batobanhchea noh trauv ban ke sa me r ch( ban kamtech anak kmean chomnue pi krom robsa nuo h) haey saampow noh kaban cht now leu phnom chou ti( now rveang bratesa aireak ning a me ni) . haey trong ban mean bantoul b nd tiet tha m h nd reay choh champoh krom del bampean noh
